azure.storage.sharedaccesssignature module¶

class azure.storage.sharedaccesssignature.Permission(path=None, query_string=None)[source]¶

Bases: object

Permission class. Contains the path and query_string for the path.

path: the resource path query_string: dict of name, values. Contains SIGNED_START, SIGNED_EXPIRY

SIGNED_RESOURCE, SIGNED_PERMISSION, SIGNED_IDENTIFIER, SIGNED_SIGNATURE name values.
class azure.storage.sharedaccesssignature.SharedAccessPolicy(access_policy, signed_identifier=None)[source]¶

Bases: object

SharedAccessPolicy class.

class azure.storage.sharedaccesssignature.SharedAccessSignature(account_name, account_key, permission_set=None)[source]¶

Bases: object

The main class used to do the signing and generating the signature.

account_name:
the storage account name used to generate shared access signature

account_key: the access key to genenerate share access signature permission_set: the permission cache used to signed the request url.

generate_signed_query_string(path, resource_type, shared_access_policy, version='2012-02-12')[source]¶

Generates the query string for path, resource type and shared access policy.

path: the resource resource_type: could be blob or container shared_access_policy: shared access policy version:

x-ms-version for storage service, or None to get a signed query string compatible with pre 2012-02-12 clients, where the version is not included in the query string.
sign_request(web_resource)[source]¶

sign request to generate request_url with sharedaccesssignature info for web_resource.

class azure.storage.sharedaccesssignature.WebResource(path=None, request_url=None, properties=None)[source]¶

Bases: object

Class that stands for the resource to get the share access signature

path: the resource path. properties: dict of name and values. Contains 2 item: resource type and

permission

request_url: the url of the webresource include all the queries.
